MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description:
Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost, efficiency, sales, and net profit. We support Startups in developing 21st century Business Models. Your very own.
We're driven by thousands of independent voters. Altogether, we develop Perfect Desire, an evolving platform of free and simple business plan calculators for everyone.
At Dynamic Applications, we are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain. We vote in online democracy, we deliver for free. We work for you, and we call them Dynamic Applications.
RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer:
Thank you for reviewing Nature Simulations. Your criticism is our inspiration.
In the free version, Target Formula Editing is limited to the Top 12 Elements. Apart from that, all is fully functional, including ToolTips, let values rise and fall in time.
Universal Promo Code: DLROW-III-MODEL

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: v7.84 - Auto Refresh of SDModel List on Save As ... (fixed). v7.78 - Setup and all DLLs recompiled on Windows 11 (64-bit). v7.78 - Society Developments - Refugees. Migrants. Natives. Population. v7.68 - simple Balanced Scorecard on Input and Target dependencies.
Program_Info.Limitations: The integrated Formula Editors are only available for the Top 10 Input and Target Values.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Dynamic Applications. Sharing Economy. Developing a Platform of Small Business Planners. Freeware.
Site.Site_Description_250: Dynamic Applications is a Small Business Consultancy. We're developing a Platform of simple, interactive, and most beautiful Small Business Planners in (x / y / t) that are free of charge in the basic version. Dynamic Applications. Sharing Economy.
Site.Site_Description_450:
Dynamic Applications is a Small Business Consultancy. We're developing a Platform of simple, interactive, and most beautiful Small Business Planners in (x / y / t). Dynamic Applications are free of charge in the basic version.
Dynamic Applications. Sharing Economy. Transparency. Privacy Protection. chance. and Participation. our values.
Site.Site_Keywords: Nature, Simulation, Human, Plants, Animals, Weather, Clouds, Forest, Water, Mass, Height, Volume, Capacity, River, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, Aral Sea, dynamicons, Dynamic Applications, Sharing Economy

Press_Release.Press_Release:
Nature Simulations is a collection of Small Business Planners around Nature, Humans, Plants and Animals.
It starts with a children's model simulating a small River from Black to Caspian Sea, at 0 m. Imagine fresh, green Trees around Aral Sea, from evaporation of Water in Caspian Sea, filling the Basins of Turkmenistan. So that New York, Stockholm, Hamburg, Amsterdam, Miami and Venice be rescued as well as Cape Town, Bangkok, Melbourne and Sydney. Of course, this has to be balanced with Treaties of Diplomacy.
So that people in Baku, Wolgograd, Rostow and Turkmenbasy are as well important as people in NYC. For this we require long years of desire, so that we see warranty negotiated beautifully. Why do we have NATO warranty, if it's not a capable Treaty organization? - Nature Simulations, starting from v7.24, again rises an innovative idea where no one shall be in sorrow for their own, beloved Family, Future, Tradition and Culture. As promised in the Holy Bible, there is so much time where we're gonna see our fine blue Planet still moving around the Sun. So with The Network of helping Hands with warranties for each family, as declared in dna license, here we just start to imagine that even the worst climate issue could be resolved, peacefully. What an impact to our global future, let's start thinking positive. We the people, altogether, living in Peace with less famine on Planet one. Our Promise.
Dynamic Applications. Transparency. Privacy protection. chance. and Participation. our values.

English.Char_Desc_2000:
Nature Simulations is a collection of Small Business Planners around Nature, Humans, Plants and Animals.
It starts with a children's model simulating a small River from Black to Caspian Sea, at 0 m. Imagine fresh, green Trees around Aral Sea, from evaporation of Water in Caspian Sea, filling the Basins of Turkmenistan. So that New York, Stockholm, Hamburg, Amsterdam, Miami and Venice be rescued as well as Cape Town, Bangkok, Melbourne and Sydney. Of course, this has to be balanced with Treaties of Diplomacy. Nature Simulations, starting from v7.24, again rises an innovative idea where no one shall be in sorrow for their own, beloved Family, Future, Tradition and Culture. We imagine that the climate issue could be resolved, peacefully.
The Water level Simulation gives an answer to the question how much a filling of the Caspian Sea basin would influence the global sea water level.
